wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Fʋ ya'a kpɛn'ɛs linɛ wʋsa ti'as la, li pa'al ye fʋ siak [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use nɛ zi'el kanɛ ka ba mɔri tʋm la], ka mɛ siak nɛ fʋ sʋʋnr wʋsa ye ba tun'e zaŋ fʋn sɔb si'el la wʋsa tʋmtʋʋma ka li dɔl nɛ [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] nɛ [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
Fʋ siak ya ye hyperlink bɛɛ URL anɛ sida bʋn zaŋi ken  Creative Commons license dimin.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''{{int:wikimedia-globalblocking-   kusaal blockedtext-all-wikis}}'''

Banɛ gu' li la anɛ $1 ($2).
Linɛ zug ka ba gu' li la anɛ ''$3''.

* Gu'ub la pin'ilʋg: $4
* Gu'ub la naar: $5

Nannanna nwa, fʋ IP adɛris anɛ $6.
Fa', fʋ ya'a mɔr bu'osa wʋsa, fʋn paasim yɛl banɛ bɛ zugin nwa.

Fʋ ya'a mi' viki ye ba zi'inɛ ka gu'uf, fʋ tun'e ia labaar nɛ suobanɛ ka fʋ na dɔlis [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] dunia wʋsa zi'elkpana ni.
Ya'a ka alaa, fʋ ya'a bɔɔdi sɔns ban gu'uf la zug, fʋn [[m:Steward requests/Global|sɔm tis Meta-Wiki ye ba maligim gɔsi li yɛla]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''Fʋ IP adɛris la ba [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

Banɛ gu' li la anɛ $1 ($2).
Linɛ zug ka ba gu' li la anɛ ''$3''.

* Gu'ub la pin'ilʋg: $4
* Gu'ub la naar: $5

Nannanna nwa, fʋ IP adɛris anɛ $6.
Fa', fʋ ya'a mɔr bu'osa wʋsa, fʋn paasim yɛl banɛ bɛ zugin nwa.

Fʋ ya'a mi' viki ye ba zi'inɛ ka gu'uf, fʋ tun'e ia labaar nɛ suobanɛ ka fʋ na dɔlis [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] dunia wʋsa si'elkpana ni.
Ya'a ka alaa, fʋ ya'a bɔɔdi sɔns ban gu'uf la zug, fʋn [[m:Steward requests/Global|sɔm tis Meta-Wiki ye ba maligim gɔsi li yɛla]].
